name: Animal Help
description:
In this game you are an animal rescuer. You have an electronic device that is activated every time an animal is in danger.

All actions in this game are done through the arrows.

- - This is my first game made with Bitsy - -

Game: Fernando Souza

Music: roboduck by airtone (c) copyright 2023 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (3.0) license. https://dig.ccmixter.org/files/airtone/6609
